name: SPACE SQUARE
description:
Hi, 

This is a game in development and i used game maker studio 2 to create it.

Hope you enjoy.

Controls:

Hold right click to slow down time and then left click to go back to normal time.

Look out for abilities they are very useful.

use the mouse to move (just point to the direction you want to go).

Hold left click to fire out bullets.

Press R to restart
